description: You will acquire the skills for integrated design, production and distribution of media content. The course incorporates text, audio, visual, interactive and graphic design elements.
prerequisites: Students enrolled in the B Communication or B Journalism pre-2017 must have completed INFS1300 + COMU1999. Students enrolled FROM 2017 must have completed COMU1130 + COMU1140 and either JOUR1112 (B Journalism students) or WRIT1200 (B Communication students).
